articles.description: Listen to Radio 5 Live commentary from 19:30 BST and follow text updates as England face South Africa in the second World Cup semi-final in Paris.
articles.title: Rugby World Cup semi-final: England v South Africa build-up

articles.description: Sir Bobby Charlton, one of the key players in England's 1966 World Cup victory and a Manchester United legend, dies at the age of 86.
articles.title: England and Man Utd legend Charlton dies aged 86

articles.description: England's World Cup defence is hanging by a thread after a horrible 229-run thrashing by South Africa in Mumbai.
articles.title: England hopes fading after South Africa thrashing

articles.description: Follow live text updates as Liverpool play Everton in the Merseyside derby in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: Liverpool 0-0 Everton - Young sent off for two bookings

articles.description: The world of football has united in tribute to Manchester United and England legend Sir Bobby Charlton, who died on Saturday.
articles.title: 'England's greatest player' - football pays tribute to Charlton

articles.description: Arsenal come from two goals down to rescue a thrilling draw at Chelsea in the Premier League at Stamford Bridge.
articles.title: Sanchez blunders as Arsenal comeback rocks Chelsea

articles.description: BBC Sport looks back at the life of Manchester United and England legend Sir Bobby Charlton, who has died aged 86.
articles.title: Sir Bobby Charlton obituary - 'One of football's most remarkable careers'

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen makes amends for qualifying sixth for the US Grand Prix by taking pole for Saturday's sprint race in Austin.
articles.title: Verstappen takes US GP sprint race pole

articles.description: Chloe Kelly's first-half strike puts Manchester City top of the Women's Super League with a hard-earned win at Leicester City.
articles.title: Man City go top of WSL with win at Leicester

articles.description: Manchester City avoid a third consecutive Premier League defeat as two first-half goals secure victory over Brighton at Etihad Stadium.
articles.title: Haaland on target as Man City beat Brighton
